page.title: 14Recreation in Saxilby Area
page.content: The 7 acre Memorial Field in Saxilby has 2 football pitches, 1 cricket pitch, 4 tennis courts, a bowling green and childrens' play area. A cedar wood pavilion consists of changing rooms, showers, toilets, kitchen and dining area. A 2 storey brick built social club has facilities for table tennis, darts, dominoes, card games and pool. There is a cricket score box also serving as a store, a tennis pavilion, brick store and toilets. A multi-purpose hard surface is being constructed for use by all clubs. Another field off Mill Lane has recently been purchased by the Parish Council for use as a recreation field. There is a good badminton court in the Village Hall. Indoor sports such as darts, dominoes, pool and snooker are played in the 4 public houses and the works' club.
